news.title: Amazon faces 'leader's dilemma' — fight AI shopping bots or join them
news.summary: Agents like OpenAI's Instant Checkout and Perplexity's Instant Buy threaten to reshape the e-commerce landscape. OpenAI is a company that developed the technology that allows people to check out and buy goods online.

news.title: These 5 infrastructure stocks have more than tripled this year on the AI trade
news.summary: Nvidia has been the biggest infrastructure winner during the AI boom. But other data center stocks have performed better this year. Nvidia is the most popular data center stock on Nasdaq.

news.title: Free streaming service Tubi is rivaling major players for viewership. Here's how it's winning
news.summary: Fox's Tubi outpaced Peacock and HBO Max for share of streaming minutes in Nielsen's November Gauge report. Tubi is available on the Fox streaming app.

news.title: 'Witch hunt': Ex-EU commissioner Breton denounces U.S. visa ban targeting 'censorship'
news.summary: The former EU commissioner and four anti-disinformation campaigners were the subject of U.S. travel sanctions. The group were accused of spreading false information about the EU.

news.title: Oil giant BP to sell 65% stake in $10 billion Castrol unit
news.summary: The oil giant is looking to divest $20 billion of its assets by the end of 2027. The company is also looking to sell off $10 billion of assets a year.

news.title: Less traffic, more lounge time, cheaper homes? How robotaxis promise a whole new world.
news.summary: Nearly every car sold by 2050 could be autonomous, according to a new report. The technology will reshape far more than just your daily commute, the report says.

news.title: One of the most important ‘Magnificent Seven’ members is rumbling to life. Here’s what that means for tech and the S&P 500.
news.summary: Nvidia shares have been on a run lately and strategist Mark Newton says that has bigger meaning for the stock market in general. Nvidia shares are up more than 20% this year.

news.title: Here’s what Nvidia investors can look forward to in 2026
news.summary: OpenAI’s upcoming GPT model and the data center buildout will be telling for the chip maker. OpenAI is a startup that aims to develop artificial intelligence.

news.title: ‘Is it a case of them or us?’ We’re in our 40s. Do we retire early in our 50s — or save for our kids’ education?
news.summary: "We’re both teachers, with a combined gross income of $210,000,” the couple says. “We�’ve got a lot of money to spend.”

news.title: L.A. Lakers owner Jeanie Buss plunks down $4.2 million on seaside California home
news.summary: Buss’ purchase of the property comes just two months after she and her family finalized the sale of their majority stake in the Lakers.
